item.title: Rules — Table Standards
item.description: Table standards in play at the table.

item.title: Sylphorne
item.description: The wind in Sylphorne learns your name before you speak. At a Glance Elven homeland tucked past dense forests southeast of Iyresa.

item.title: Coast of Iyresa
item.description: Every tide that reaches Iyresa carries a rumor worth coin. At a Glance Twin cities Cascadea (luxury) and Stonefall (grit) anchor trade.

item.title: Aetheris Isles
item.description: Skyfarers measure distance in breaths of wind. At a Glance Floating archipelago sustained by floatstone towers and the Ascension Zone.

item.title: Reference — Quick Guides
item.description: Fast navigation for newcomers and table prep. Where to Start guided path. Glossary, Timeline. Travel & Hazards, Major Factions.

item.title: Travel and Hazards
item.description: Sea: Black Tides demand escorts; most safe crossings stage via Westreach Port.

item.title: Where to Start
item.description: Start with a Region Begin at Coast of Iyresa for trade hubs, cities, and faction drama.

item.title: Glossary
item.description: Drift: Cascadea district; five total, each with its own chair. Hollow: Stonefall strata; lower hollows grow rough and lawless.

item.title: Major Factions
item.description: Council of Three: Governs the Isles; balances island interests. Ascendant Guild: Oversees sky farms and floatstone construction.

item.title: Timeline
item.description: Prehistory: Meteor strike scatters floatstone across the north, lifting Cascadea’s landmass and birthing the Coast of Iyresa crater.
